# standardOptions

**Type Property**

An option that represents the union of all standard compression options.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying class var standardOptions: NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions { get }
```

## Creating standard options

- **hideImages**: An option specifying that views should hide their images.
- **hideText**: An option specifying that views should hide their text.
- **reduceMetrics**: An option specifying that views should reduce their internal metrics.
- **breakEqualWidths**: An option specifying that views should no longer maintain equal width constraints.
